Rowdy Wolf/Terrorsaur:




"I must have been told wrong," Rowdy Wolf said to Stingtra. "My apologies." 
He looked around. "So, what do we do?"

"We're here!" a gruff voice called out. The red flier, Terrorsaur flew 
towards them. He flapped his wings, hovering a distance above Rowdy Wolf. 
"So, what's the situation?" He knew he could have done a fancy entrance, but 
he didn't know which on to take.
